mapper.select: SELECT * FROM nj_user_work_info INNER JOIN (SELECT work_info.user_id as user_id, max(version) as max_version FROM nj_user_work_info work_info WHERE work_info.user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND work_info.version >= 0 GROUP BY work_info.user_id) tmp ON nj_user_work_info.user_id= tmp.user_id AND nj_user_work_info.version=tmp.max_version

SELECT org_nature as company_nature, org_name as company_name, org_contact as company_mobile, org_address as company_address, position as company_position, month_income as month_income, recent_work_years as work_continue FROM nj_user_work_info INNER JOIN (SELECT work_info.user_id as user_id, max(version) as max_version FROM nj_user_work_info work_info WHERE work_info.user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND work_info.version >= 0 GROUP BY work_info.user_id) tmp ON nj_user_work_info.user_id= tmp.user_id AND nj_user_work_info.version=tmp.max_version limit 1
SELECT nuwi.* FROM nj_user_work_info nuwi INNER JOIN nj_order_work nowr on nowr.order_id = #{orderId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and nowr.work_id = nuwi.id

SELECT org_nature AS company_nature, manage_income AS business_year, annual_income AS income_year, org_name AS company_name, org_contact AS company_mobile, org_address AS company_address, department, position AS company_position, month_income AS month_income, rent_income AS rent_year, family_income AS total_year, recent_work_years AS work_continue FROM nj_user_work_info nuwi INNER JOIN nj_order_work nowr on nowr.order_id = #{orderId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and nowr.work_id = nuwi.id;

SELECT t1.attachment_id AS attachmentId ,t1.type ,t2.file_path AS attachmentUrl FROM nj_user_work_attachment t1 INNER JOIN nj_user_attachment t2 ON t1.attachment_id = t2.id WHERE t1.work_id = #{workId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
